Author: 53m1k0l0n
Name: LazyLoot
Description:
Roll command with various arguments need | needonly | greed | pass | passall. 
Chat and Toast output and delay for rolling.
Changelog:
- Complete rework and clean. 
- Only one rollcommand with arguments. /roll need | needonly | greed | pass | passall 
- Improved checking the rolling status for unidue stuff and Unlockable stuff like mounts and minions ( Thanks to Gidedin, Midori and LWDUII in SimpleTweaks. ) 
- FULF = Fancy Ultimate Lazy Feature or Autoroll, will roll on loot as soon it's available for rolling, like chest opens.
